price: Indeed, your Lord alone knows best who has strayed from His way and those who are rightly guided.
arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
